text:
Mario Rafael Díaz-Balart Caballero (born September 25, 1961) is an American politician. He is a Republican. Since 2003, he has served as a member of the U.S. House of Representatives. He currently represents. He has also served in the Florida House of Representatives (1988–1992, 2000–2002) and the Florida Senate (1992–2000). He was born in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.
In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Díaz-Balart tested positive for COVID-19.
